opts_knit$set(base.dir = './', fig.path = '', out.format = 'md')

# readxl: Read Excel Files

エクセルファイルを読み込む

[![](http://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/readxl)](http://cran.rstudio.com/web/packages/readxl/index.html)

* CRAN: http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/readxl/index.html
* GitHub: http://github.com/hadley/readxl

```{r}
library(readxl)
```

バージョン: `r packageVersion("readxl")`

-----

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis", eval = FALSE}
library(help = "readxl")$info[[2]] %>% data.frame() %>% kable()
```

| 関数名 | 概略 |
|--------|------|
| `excel_sheets` | List all sheets in an excel spreadsheet. |
| `read_excel` | Read xls and xlsx files. |

## read_excel

`.xls`, `.xlsx`形式のファイルを読み込む。特定のシートを読み込む（初期値は１）場合は`sheet`引数で指定する

```{r, eval = FALSE}
read_excel(path, sheet = 1, col_names = TRUE, col_types = NULL, na = "", skip = 0)
```

```{r}
datasets <- system.file("extdata/datasets.xlsx", package = "readxl")
# readxlパッケージ内付属のxlsxファイルのディレクトリを与える
read_excel(datasets) %>% head()

read_excel(datasets, sheet = 2) %>% head()
```
